text: hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with black lemon chicken so here we
go this is a really easy simple chicken
dish kind of a warm salad but not really
I have four lemons to our very large
sweet Meyer lemons and 2 irregular

about I don't know a half to a 3/4 of a

are nice and sweet but if you can't get

to throw in some pepper some cayenne a
little cumin some olive oil some salt
I'm going to whisk that up and I'm going
to take a giant chicken this is like a
five pound chicken I have here and I'm
going to take off any disgusting large
chunks of fat stuck to it and I'm going
to swirl that around in that lemon
mixture a couple times and then I'm
going to leave it breast side down right
on the counter room temperature for a
half hour don't be scared it's fine all
right I'm going to take a heavy baking
dish this is a cast iron porcelain
glazed a roasting pans find something
you can put on the stove the size is
kind of important here so you can
probably find a glass baking dish that
size because we're going to make the

little oil on the bottom I'm going to
take the marinade the lemon juice

on the top and around and about and just
dump it right on I'm going to take my
pastry brush here my silicone pastry
brush all right I'm going to kind of
brush the seasoning over it a little

I'm going to tie up the back legs
another little brushing a very generous
sprinkling of salt don't forget the
sides of the thighs all right we're
throw that in oven 375 for 45 minutes
it's not going to be cooked because it's
huge chicken but we got to do some
things so after 45 minutes pull it out
and you see the black lemon those lemon

why it tastes so delicious maybe some of

all I know is it tastes really good I'm

it I can add about a cup of chicken
stock and then I'm going to cook it till
done for me was about another 30 minutes
all right you have to figure that out

it really was bugging me so I did a
little cosmetic work here and I feel

with foil loosely for 20 minutes after
20 minutes we're going to put this on

out of there drain any juices I'm going
to add about another 1/2 a cup to 3/4 of
a
a stock and why I wanted you to use a
heatproof pan that you could put right

amazing amazing juice down to a sauce
which is actually going to be more like

incredibly intense caramelized lemon and
it really gives us such a unique flavor
all right to reduce that by 1/2 I
normally serve this dish on some kind of

anything like that works so I'm going to

of course you've tasted for seasoning
maybe give a little more pepper a little

that's going to be the base of the

coated greens down it's got that

the fat from the chicken and that
